column2: "Are you thinking I should get it myself? The person who made the request is not ARKS."
"That's why that may be the request, but I'm in trouble when it's asked of me."
"So I'm choosing you! You can do it while doing your own work, but if you see one, let me know!"
"I think it was the \"Butterfly Dance.\" Ya, she really emphasized that she wanted that picture!"
"I'm sorry for always just taking your time! I'm counting on you!"
